attributes.action: stop charging university students in England or start charging Scottish students
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Labour government is currently charging students in the UK to attend University. Whereas in Scotland the Education is free of charge. 

Along with living cost, English students are gaining massive debts leaving University. This situation is because of a predominantly Scottish Labour government. 

In summery English students should not pay for University or Scottish students should.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
